column4: hi, is there a way to make logrotate and syslog-ng play nicely?  this is the output i'm getting daily: http://goo.gl/3wpVo
thats strange- im running Arch and using both syslog-ng and logrotate without issues
there's a few people posting about it but couldn't see a fix
odd.. I dont have a lucid setup so I cant help you their- I have Arch and Natty (11.04)
